summary: The story of 1985-86 season of Indiana University's men's basketball team, led by the controversial coach Bob Knight, who would later be banned for his abusive behavior.
cast: Brian Dennehy|Al Thompson|Benz Antoine|James Lafferty|Michael James Johnson|Dan Becker|Patrick Williams|Yorick Parke|Gary Hudson|Mike Weekes|Duane Murray|Thomas Hauff|Phoenix Gonzales|Manfred Maretzki|Chad Bruce|Frank Adamson|Barbara Barnes-Hopkins|John Bluethner|Vince Doria|James Ferreira|Patti D. Grayson|James Kirk|James D. Kirk|Arthur Lawrence Jr.|Robb Paterson|Digger Phelps|Steven Ratzlaff|Bob Ryan|Jessica Scott|Chris Sigurdson|Ryan Sommerfeld|Warren Louis Wiltshire|Kevin Yeboah|Peter Yurashchuk|Kalyn Bomback|Myles Brand|Cory Cassidy|Edgar Governo|Michael Jordan|Bobby Knight|Jennifer Mitchell|Bill Ryan|Dick Vitale
title: Más allá del juego
